chat.msg: Hello! Welcome to our map navigation game. Are you ready to start exploring the map?

Great! Let's begin. You are currently at the top-right corner of the map. I'll guide you through the path step-by-step. 

First, take a few steps to your left until you reach a small island. On this island, you'll see a leopard resting. Go just below the leopard to continue on the correct path.

Well done! Now, look for a wooden twig that leads to a larger island. Cross over the twig to reach this island. On this island, you'll find a parrot and an elephant. 

To continue on the correct path, go over the head of the parrot and then head down (south) between the parrot and the elephant. Keep going south until you reach the edge of this island.

Great progress! Now, we'll leave this island and continue in a south-eastern direction. Look for 3 rocks - 2 gray ones and a darker one. Cross over these rocks to reach a new island.

Once you're on the new island, you'll spot a frog. To stay on track, go below (south of) the frog. After that, make a u-turn to the left (west). This will lead you back to the island with the parrot and the elephant. Keep going in the westward direction until you reach the island.

You're doing fantastic! Now, you're back on the island with the parrot and the elephant. This time, we'll go in a leftward direction (west).

Cross over the two gray rocks towards an island with a giraffe. When you reach the giraffe, make sure to go below it (south-west). 

After passing the giraffe, make a 90-degree turn to the left (south-east) and continue on to another island. On this island, you'll find a snake. Cross over the snake to move forward on the path.

Now, I'll let you discover what awaits you on this final island. Keep following the path and treasure awaits you. Enjoy the adventure!

chat.msg:
Hello! Welcome to our map navigation game. Are you ready for an adventure? Let's get started! You are currently at the top-right corner of the map, right next to a white dog. 

To begin, I want you to take a few steps to your left (west) and you will see a wooden bench. Can you see the bench?
Great! Now, make your way below the wooden bench and continue straight. You will come across a stream. Can you see the stream in front of you?

Fantastic! How adventurous! Now, I want you to cross the stream and continue walking straight until you see a florist stand. But don't stop there just yet! Take a left U-turn and cross the stream again. Can you see the florist stand in the distance?
Great job! Now, after crossing the stream again, head back towards the white dog. You'll notice a wooden branch crossing a river just near the dog. Can you see the branch?

Superb! Now, cross over the wooden branch to the south and continue walking straight. Keep going southwards (down the map). You'll soon spot another white dog sitting next to a red and white checkered picnic. Can you see the dog and the picnic?

Perfect! The adventure continues. Carefully walk over the checkered picnic mat, making sure not to disturb the bowl of berries on it. Then continue to the west. Can you see the berries and continue to the west?

Wonderful! Now, just a little further ahead, you'll come across another wooden branch that crosses the river. This time, cross the branch to the north. Can you see the branch and cross it to the north?

Great job! Now, after crossing the river, you'll notice a green bush ahead of you. Instead of going straight through it, I want you to circle around it from the right side. Can you see the bush? Circle around it from the right, please.

Awesome! You're doing great! Now, keep following the path until you reach the florist stand. Once you reach the stand, take a left turn (west) and continue walking. Can you see the florist stand? Take a left and keep going.

Fantastic! Just a little further ahead, you'll come across a big bridge with two people riding a bicycle. Pass to the west side of the bridge and keep going. Can you see the bridge with the two people on bicycles? Pass to the west and continue.

Brilliant! Now, just past the bridge, there will be two elderly people sitting on a bench, engrossed in their newspapers. Take a few steps south, between the old people and another wooden branch. Can you see the elderly people? Go south, between them and the wooden branch.

Great job! Now, you should be standing next to a green bush, right at the end of the wooden branch. Take a turn to your right and walk towards the east, between the branch and the bush. Can you see the bush and the branch? Go east, between them.
Excellent! You're almost there! Just a few steps to the east, you will find a brown young deer. Congratulations! You have reached your final destination. Well done! Can you see the brown young deer?

chat.msg: Hello! Welcome to our navigation game. I'm going to give you instructions on how to follow a specific path on a map. Are you ready to start?
Great! Let's begin. You're currently at the top (north) part of the map, right outside a tent. To start, take a few steps south of the tent. Can you see the trail in front of you?

Perfect! Now, follow the trail and continue heading east. After a few steps, you'll come across a young puppy. Take a left (east) under the puppy and keep going. Do you see a small bonfire north of the trail?

Excellent! Leave the trail and go north, passing the bonfire on your left. Then, continue east on the trail. Keep an eye out for two red mushrooms along the way. Once you pass them, you'll see a blue car. Remember not to touch the car. Instead, make a right u-turn and start heading west. Can you see the car and make the u-turn?

Great job! Now that you've made the u-turn, continue heading west until you reach a fork in the road. At the fork, take the left branch (heading south). As you go south, you'll pass east of a telescope. Once you pass it, veer to the right and take an off-trail shortcut around the telescope until you return to the trail. Can you see the telescope and start going around it?

Fantastic! Now that you're back on the trail, continue heading west. After a little while, you'll reach a low wall of rocks that surrounds a wooden cabin. Your final destination is this cabin. Leave the trail and cross the low wall of rocks to reach the cabin. Can you see the cabin and make your way towards it?
